title: Insurance Australia Group to sell SBI General interest for $432 mln
text:
Insurance Australia Group to sell SBI General interest for $432 mln

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 17, 2019 03:18)

© Reuters. Insurance Australia Group to sell SBI General interest for $432 mln Oct 17 (Reuters) - Insurance Australia Group on Thursday said it had agreed sell its 26% interest in its joint venture with State Bank of India , SBI General Insurance SBIR.NS , for about A$640 million ($432.38 million). The insurer said Napean Opportunities and an affiliate of Warburg Pincus would acquire a 16.01% and 9.99% interest in SBI General, respectively. ($1 = 1.4802 Australian dollars)

Insurance Australia Group to sell SBI General interest for $432 mln
